Hierarchy - Top-Down.small_text: You prefer working in clear, structured chains of command.
Hierarchy - Top-Down.big_text: You work best when roles, rules, and reporting are well defined.

Hierarchy - Flat.small_text: You prefer working in open, collaborative teams.
Hierarchy - Flat.big_text: You like shared responsibility, open communication, and informal structure.

Tasks - Predictable.small_text: You enjoy routine, clarity, and repetitive tasks.
Tasks - Predictable.big_text: You feel focused and confident when you know what to expect.

Tasks - Unpredictable.small_text: You thrive on variety, uncertainty, and fast-changing tasks.
Tasks - Unpredictable.big_text: You like the unexpected. It keeps you sharp and energized.

Agility - Flexible.small_text: You easily shift gears and respond to changing needs.
Agility - Flexible.big_text: You're adaptable, resilient, and handle surprises with grace.

Agility - Rooted.small_text: You prefer steadiness, structure, and fixed systems.
Agility - Rooted.big_text: You stay grounded in tradition and prefer doing things the proven way.

Risk Appetite - Higher.small_text: You’re open to risk and bold in your decisions.
Risk Appetite - Higher.big_text: You see opportunity where others see uncertainty. Risk excites you.

Risk Appetite - Lower.small_text: You’re cautious and calculated in your decisions.
Risk Appetite - Lower.big_text: You prefer certainty and safety over taking chances.

Independence - Higher.small_text: You enjoy working alone and setting your own direction.
Independence - Higher.big_text: You value autonomy, trust yourself, and like doing things your way.

Independence - Lower.small_text: You prefer working with support, teams, and guidance.
Independence - Lower.big_text: You find comfort in collaboration and thrive with direction and support.
